General.Name: Quantumscape Corp
General.Description: QuantumScape Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, focuses on the development and commercialization of solid-state lithium-metal batteries for electric vehicles and other applications in the United States. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in San Jose, California.
General.Address: 1730 Technology Drive, San Jose, CA, United States, 95110
